description:
# Syft

## Description

A CLI tool and Go library for generating a Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) from container images and filesystems [https://github.com/anchore/syft](https://github.com/anchore/syft)

## Features

- Install and uninstall via Chocolatey
- Supports 64-bit version
p
## Usage

### Direct

```cmd
choco install syft -y
```

### YAML (Foreman, puppetlabs/chocolatey module)

```yaml
syft:
  ensure: latest
  provider: chocolatey
```

or

```yaml
syft:
  ensure: latest
```
summary: A CLI tool and Go library for generating a Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) from container images and filesystems.
author: Anchore Inc
